serialize(Object...) - Static method in class byteremote.common.serialization.Serializer
Method used to serialize a variable length list of objects into a ByteBuffer The primitives, primitives wrappers and String will be serialized as native.
serializeArray(DataOutputStream, Object, int) - Static method in class byteremote.common.serialization.Serializer
Method used to serialize an array If it is an array of primitives it will be serialized as a single object, if it is an array of objects it will be serialized element by element (it will call serializeObject(element))
serializeObject(DataOutputStream, Object, int) - Static method in class byteremote.common.serialization.Serializer
This method is used to serialize an object.
